grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 頓狂【トンキョウ】wild, in disarray
頓呼法【トンコホウ】apostrophe (figure of speech)
華府【ワシントン】Washington, DC (capital of the United States of America), Washington (US state)
整理整頓【セイリセイトン】keeping things tidy and in order
kun reading compounds: 頓と【とんと】completely, not at all
頓に【とみに】suddenly, all at once, rapidly
